Title: Relates to leaving the scene of an incident without reporting
Summary: Increases the penalty for leaving the scene of an incident without reporting; creates a public service campaign informing the public of the laws surrounding leaving the scene of an incident without reporting; establishes the statewide hit-and-run alert system.
LawCode: Amd ยง600, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to leaving the scene of an incident without reporting
